cause.description:
for centuries we have been diciplined into this world, running around in this little maze just trying to get cheese, red stop grean go, need more cheese, stimulations please to get more and more cheese.
are you not tired of the rat race. dont you want to feel free and not like to herd that is a subject of fate.. its not fate, create it, look at it with new eyes.. you are already free. beliief is the # 1 majic tool in the world and it can shape your world to a better life.
1. Save your Sanity
2. Be creative
3. Love yourself
cause.name: RAT RACE RECOVERY
